analysis.description:
ReconTokenFactory.cashBack (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#2424-2435) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(ethSent[_to]) (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#2433-2435)

Reentrancy in Congress.executeProposal (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#535-581):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode)) (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#570-572)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposals (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#573)
ReconLib.ecrecoverFromSig (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#1408-1427) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol:
	Contract ReconToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#1732)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TestApproveAndCallFallBack.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#2677-2681) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transferFrom(from,address(this),tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0x5bd6a6d4b21d4b4952426cb23aea7f7bb4944c9b.sol#2679-2680)
